import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import { getBasicInfo } from '../../store/actions/basicInfoActions' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { getAllAirports } from '../../store/actions/airportActions'; class Footer extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { usefulLink: [], footerLogo: [], } } async componentDidMount() { let { getBasicInfo, getAllAirports, common } = this.props if (common.airlines.length === 0) { await getBasicInfo() } if (common.airports.length === 0) { await getAllAirports() } } static getDerivedStateFromProps(nextProps, prevState) { if (nextProps.common.usefulLink === prevState.usefulLink) return null return { usefulLink: nextProps.common.usefulLink, footerLogo: nextProps.common.footerLogo, } } render() { let { usefulLink, footerLogo } = this.state return (

    {footerLogo.map(item =>

 ) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ common: state.common, }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getBasicInfo, getAllAirports })(Footer)
